metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28190 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where improper input validation can cause denial of service.

notes.Note: sbeattie> only affects windows drivers mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
